entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Temperature rising to 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to 8 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 16 January 2023
